title: Update landing contact WhatsApp/Call number to 9113112297

requirements.summary: Update the Contact section WhatsApp and Call actions to use the phone number 9113112297.
acceptanceCriteria: In frontend/src/components/landing/landingContent.ts, contactInfo.whatsapp and contactInfo.phone are updated so the WhatsApp and tel: links target 9113112297.
Clicking the "WhatsApp Us" button opens a WhatsApp chat link that targets 9113112297.
Clicking the "Call Now" button triggers a tel: link that targets 9113112297.

file_operations.description: Update contactInfo.whatsapp and contactInfo.phone to use 9113112297 (keep existing formatting consistent with current values) so ContactSection's WhatsApp (wa.me) and Call (tel:) actions target the new number.
